column4: okay after going to medibuntu and following instructions on the ubuntu site for installing google earth.  I now get the following message when trying to update ubuntu:  E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.
E: _cache->open() failed, please report.  any suggestions
so can anyone tell me how to fix this error: E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.
